TITLE: Saudi Arabia sentences woman to 34 years in prison for social media posts promoting women's rights: report
SUMMARY: Saudi Arabia has reportedly sentenced a woman to over three decades in prison after she criticized the government's stance on women's rights on social media.

TITLE: Iran officials to demand penalty payment should US pull out of Nuclear Deal again: report
SUMMARY: The U.S. and Iran have used the approaching deadline for the agreement of the nuclear deal to push for additional demands, including an end to Iranian assassination efforts.

TITLE: Massive British water company announces London-area restrictions to 'ensure the taps keep running'
SUMMARY: A British water utility announced Wednesday new restrictions set to go into effect next week in the London area River Thames reaches lowest level since 2005.

TITLE: Outrage over German chancellor's silence as Palestinian leader says Israel committed '50 Holocausts'
SUMMARY: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is engulfed in an antisemitism scandal due to what critics say was his non-reaction to Palestinian leader Abbas' trivialization of the Holocaust.

TITLE: Suicides in Japan surged due to COVID-19 pandemic
SUMMARY: Japan saw a spike in its already-high suicide rates as a result of pandemic related mental health issues, according to a study from the University of Tokyo.

TITLE: Man captured in gruesome act after beheading father: police
SUMMARY: A man was arrested by French police after allegedly beheading his father in a parking lot, after police found him carrying the severed head and a knife around the scene.

TITLE: Putin says he's 'ready to offer' allies, including in Latin America, the 'most modern' military weaponry
SUMMARY: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Monday his country is prepared to sell weaponry across the globe that he says is 'superior' to weapons made by his foreign counterparts.

TITLE: Trudeau celebrates Canadian windfall from Biden signing Inflation Reduction Act
SUMMARY: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau celebrated President Biden signing the Inflation Reduction Act Tuesday, saying the bill would benefit Canadian manufacturing.

TITLE: Human remains found in suitcase bought at auction in New Zealand
SUMMARY: Human remains were found in suitcases won in an auction. New Zealand police released a statement on August 11 about the homicide case that is still being investigated.

TITLE: US drone strike kills 13 al-Shabab fighters in Somalia
SUMMARY: An American drone strike in Somalia killed 13 members of the terrorist organization al-Shabab, the U.S. military confirmed, stating no civilians appeared to have been hurt.
